extraSlotScope.moremousetweaks.EXTRA.too: Extra slots will be processed as a separate inventory.
extraSlotScope.moremousetweaks.HOTBAR.to: Extra slots will be processed as part of the hotbar.
extraSlotScope.moremousetweaks.INVENTORY: Extra slots will be processed as part of the main inventory.
extraSlotScope.moremousetweaks.NONE.tool: Extra slots will not be processed.
hotbarScope.moremousetweaks.HOTBAR.toolt: Hotbar will be processed as a separate inventory.
hotbarScope.moremousetweaks.INVENTORY.to: Hotbar will be processed as part of the main inventory.
message.moremousetweaks.installCloth: Install Cloth Config API to access mod options
moremousetweaks.name: MoreMouseTweaks
option.moremousetweaks.alwaysMatchByType: Item-matching operations will always match items with the same type.
option.moremousetweaks.dropKey.tooltip: The key to hold to allow dropping items via LMB.
option.moremousetweaks.interactionInterv: The minimum time, in milliseconds, between interaction events.
option.moremousetweaks.interactionRate.t: Reduce for faster operation, increase if you are experiencing packet rate issues
The key to hold to apply an action to all slots containing matching items.
option.moremousetweaks.quickCrafting.too: Allow quick-crafting and quick-trading via right-click
option.moremousetweaks.typeMatchTags.too:
Items with any of the tags in this list will be matched by type when CTRL-clicking.
See %s for a list of tags
Items with any of the tags in this list will be matched by type only.
Only used if 'Always Match by Type' is disabled.
See %s for a list of tags.
qcOverflowMode.moremousetweaks.INVENTORY: Quick-crafting excess will be placed in the inventory, if possible
qcOverflowMode.moremousetweaks.NONE.tool: Quick-crafting will not be allowed beyond a full carried stack
qcOverflowMode.moremousetweaks.RESULT_SL: Quick-crafting excess will be placed in the crafting output slot
qcSingleCraftMode.moremousetweaks.CURSOR: Pick up items until the cursor is full, then place the excess into the inventory.
